name: Balloon Panic!
description:
Made by Me in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50

Theme: Delay the Inevitable.

Fancy a nice balloon ride through the countryside?

Fantastic!

Just mind the birds, dear.

Do your best to keep yourself afloat as long as possible, increase your score by hitting those pesky pigeons!

I am just one man, but improving the game after the jam is over is not out of the question, so feel free to leave feedback on my first published work!
